document.title: PSN : Mise a jour du 19/05/2010
document.author: JohnCouscous
document.text: Hello, voici la mise à jour de la semaine (19/05/2010) sur le PlayStation Network : Offres Spéciales (Disponible jusqu’au 26 mai 2010) * TV Show King (prix initial – 6.99 € maintenant – 4.99 €) * Critter Crunch (prix initial – 5.99 € maintenant – 2.99 €) * Hyperballoid HD (prix initial – 3.99 € maintenant – 2.99 €) * Mushroom Wars (prix initial – 9.99 € maintenant – 4.99 €) * Magic Orbz (prix initial – 9.99 € maintenant – 4.99 €) * Thexder Neo (PSP) (prix initial – 7.99 € maintenant – 3.99 €) * Obscure: The Aftermath (PSP) (prix initial – 29.99 € maintenant – 14.99 €) * Monsters Inc: Scare Island (PSOne) (prix initial – 4.99 € maintenant – 3.99 €) * Peter Pan: Adventures in Never Land (PSOne) (prix initial – 4.99 € maintenant – 3.99 €) * Zombie Tycoon (mini) (prix initial – 3.99 € maintenant – 2.49 €) Permanent Price Reductions * Joust (prix initial – 4.99 € maintenant – 1.99 €) * Championship Sprint (prix initial – 4.99 € maintenant – 1.99 €) Jeux Téléchargeables (PSP) * ModNation Racers (26.99 €) Rating: PEGI 7 * Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands (29.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 * Armoured Core 3 Portable (14.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 * ModNation Racers – code réseau (fourni dans la boite) (A télécharger uniquement si le code réseau est absent ou n’est plus valide) (9.99 €) Rating: PEGI 7 minis (PS3/PSP) * Coconut Dodge (2.49 €) Rating: PEGI 3 Démos (PS3) * ModNation Racers Rating: PEGI 7 * Tiger Woods PGA Tour 11 Rating: PEGI 3 Démos (PSP) * ModNation Racers Rating: PEGI 7 Ajouts de jeux et contenus (PS3) * Dragon Age: Origins – The Darkspawn Chronicles (4.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 * ModNation Racers – Van Man Pack (1.75 €) Rating: PEGI 7 * Split/Second: Velocity o Full Vehicle Unlock! (2.99 €) o Master Unlock! (4.99 €) * Track and Mode Unlock! (2.99 €) Rating: PEGI 7 * Rock Band (Rating: PEGI 12 – Non disponible au Luxembourg) o A Girl Like You by The Smithereens (1.49 €) o Only A Memory by The Smithereens (1.49 €) o Grateful Dead Pack 03 (contient toutes les chansons ci-dessous qui sont également disponibles à l’unité) (7.99 €) o Beat It on Down The Line (1.49 €) o Cumberland Blues (1.49 €) o Scarlet Begonias (1.49 €) o U.S. Blues (1.49 €) o Throwing Stones (1.49 €) o Touch of Grey (1.49 €) * Rock Band Network (Rating: PEGI 12 – Non disponible au Luxembourg) o Bodies by Drowning Pool (1.49 €) o Days Without by All That Remains (1.49 €) o Energy by Apples in Stereo (0.79 €) o He Sleeps In A Grove by Amberian Dawn (1.49 €) o I Kmaintenant What I Am by Band of Skulls (1.49 €) o Little Black Backpack 09 by Stoke 9 (1.49 €) o Semi-Charmed Life 09 by Third Eye Blind (1.49 €) o Sequestered In Memphis by The Hold Steady (1.49 €) o Survive by Lacuna Coil (1.49 €) o Talk About by Dear in the Headlights (0.79 €) o When I Get Home You’re So Dead by Mayday Parade (1.49 €) * Guitar Hero 5 (Rating: PEGI 12) o Aerosmith Track Pack (contient les chansons ci-dessous qui sont également disponibles à l’unité) (5.49 €) o Livin’ on the Edge (1.99 €) o Love In An Elevator (1.99 €) o Rag Doll (1.99 €) Ajouts de jeux et contenus (PSP) * LittleBigPlanet – Turbo! Premium Level Kit (5.99 €) Rating: PEGI 7 * Buzz! Quiz World – National Geographic Undersea Quiz (3.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Trailers (PS3) * Söldner-X 2: Final Prototype Trailer * Medal of Honor Announce Trailer * FIFA 10 Ultimate Team Returning User Tutorial Thèmes Dynamiques (PS3) * Aqua Panic! Spring Thème (0.99 €) Fonds d’écran (PS3) * Söldner-X 2: Final Prototype Fonds d’écran 1 et 2 Sorties additionnelles sur d’autres territoires (PS3) * Split/Second: Velocity Démo (Maintenant disponible en Belgique et au Luxembourg) Source : http://fr.playstation.com/ Pour ma part, je viens juste de récupérer ModNation Racers et 3D Dot Game, je vous prépare donc 2 tests, à venir prochainement. Bon jeu !
